field.name: summary
field.value: nant does not build satellite resource properly

field.name: description
field.value:
As title, I found evidence here: http://discuss.fogcreek.com/dotnetquestions/default.asp?cmd=show&ixPost=4406
For some reason the new localizationfilter I added does not fetch the right locale script, after careful inspection its the broken satellite dll created by nant. using the one build by VS works fine.
We should find a way to avoid this issue completely, that would make us getting really frustrated in the future when further localization is required- we absolutely dont want to look into VS and copy a file everytime after nant build.
P.S. I saw the Castle.Components.Validator contains a pt culture resource dll too, if want to double verify the issue we could test for that one.
